blog.name: cupidsstyles
blog.title: xx.
blog.description: tee | 18 | i write some (okay) things | harry styles has my whole heart

title: Love,
body:
Summary: Inspired by To All The Boys I’ve Loved Before, you write love letters to a boy. friends to lovers. 

Warnings: maybe a curse. nothing serious, just fluff.

Requested: No. 

June 7th, 2018 - Houston, Texas

Harry Styles, You are a star. You were born to perform. You belong on stage. I feel so privileged to be able to watch you. And I get to experience this for the rest of my summer.  The energy and love you put into each show is inspiring. You care so much. I’m in awe of you every night. 

Love, Y/N

“What are you doing?” Harry leans over your shoulder as you stuff the folded up paper into an envelop. You push him away, “Ouch.”

“I’m writing my mom,” You stuff the envelope into your bag, “Telling her how much I hate it here.” Harry laughs as he looks over the snacks table. It was mostly empty, the rest of band taking what they wanted while he was in shower. 

Harry picks up an apple, “Did you mention how horrible my singing is?” 

You nod, standing up from your seat, “It was the first line. Dear Mom, Harry’s voice is awful.” You pull your bag over your shoulder and shake your head. 

He laughs as the door opens. Some venue staff comes in, “Sorry, we’re leaving now. Thank you so much for having me.” He smiles politely before dragging you from the room. 

You follow behind him, your hands intertwined. “You know I don’t actually hate it here, right?” Your rational side knows Harry is aware of the joke, but you still feel the need to reassure him you loved it here. “i love it here, I love being with you.” 

Harry turns around and squeezes your hand reassuringly, “I know.” 

June 11th, 2018 - Atlanta, Georgia. 

Harry Styles, You are beautiful. And I don’t mean in the physical sense. (Even though are beautiful in that sense too) I mean you have one of the kindest hearts ever. You care about everyone you meet, no matter their circumstances. You believe in the good and want to change the world. I’m amazed by you every day. Some stars only believe in kindness if it benefits them, if it’s good publicity. But that’s never mattered to you, I know it’s never mattered to you. You genuinely just want the best for people. I love that about you. 

Love, Y/N. 

“What are you doing?” You jump at Sarah’s voice, you turn and she’s staring at you inquisitively. 

“Nothing.” You shove the letter into your suitcase before standing up to look at her. “Just putting something away.”

She nods, unconvinced, “You know usually envelopes go in mailboxes, so they can be mailed.” You laugh nervously and walk towards the lounge area on the bus. “What is it? You can tell me, I’m good with secrets.” 

You look around, to make sure there was no one but Sarah around, before sighing. “I write love letters.” You look down at your feet, a little embarrassed, “To Harry. I write letters to him.” 

Sarah stares, “Like, how they communicated in the nineteenth century?” You nod and she bursts out laughing. Heat rushes to your face, “Stop! It’s not funny.” 

She straightens her face out and nods, “You’re right. It’s not, it’s very sweet. Harry will love that, he’s an old soul.” 

“He’s never getting them” You shake your head, “They’re more like a diary, nobody is ever supposed to read them. Just a way to express my feelings. Beside, he doesn’t feel that way, it would be weird.” 

She rolls her eyes, “That boy thinks you hung the moon and all the stars. I promise he feels the same way.” At your silence she sighs, “Don’t give him letters. But I think you should tell him, you’d be surprised with the outcome.” 

June 14th, 2018 - Hershey, Pennsylvania. 

Harry Styles, I am in the sweetest place on earth with the sweetest boy on earth. That’s very corny, but I think you would like it. You love corny jokes. I told Sarah about my letters. She thinks you would love them, but I’m not so sure. They’re not real letters, more like small entries whenever I really feel like I need to get my feelings out. It felt good to tell her though, it’s nice not having this a huge secret. I wish I could tell you, but I’m afraid that would make things awkward between is. I don’t know if I could handle things being awkward between us. It might just kill me…

Love, Y/N. 

“I love the smell of chocolate, don’t you?” You’re sitting in one the seats as Harry jogs in front of you. 

“You can smell it from here?” He stops in front of before spinning around like it would help him, “I can’t.” 

You laugh, “No, you dork. I just know some parts of the park smells like chocolate. And the store outside the park.” 

Harry rolls his eyes, “Last time I was here was with the boys. A few of us dressed up in the costumes. It was hilarious.” He shakes his head with a soft smile. 

“You miss them?” He comes to sit next to you, taking a sip from his water bottle. “Yeah, it’s weird touring without them. I did it for so long it became second nature, you know?” You nod and wipe a little sweat off Harry’s forehead with the his little towel. 

He smiles in thanks, “I love the band though. They’re amazing, and having you is the best.” He shrugs, looking down at his feet. “I’m grateful for being able to tour on my own and have my own career, I just miss them sometimes.” 

“Missing them doesn’t make you ungrateful. It makes you human.” You smile softly, “They were like your brothers, I would be worried if you didn’t miss them.”

“Have I ever told you how much I adore you?” He asks and you laugh, “Not nearly enough.”

“I adore you.”

June 22nd, 2018 - New York. New York.

Harry Styles, You have sold out arguably the most popular concert venue. Not one show, but two shows. I am so incredibly proud of you. You deserve all this and more. I hope you know that.

Love, Y/N.

New York is beautiful. Loud and busy, but beautiful. And it was one the shows that had time in between the next, so you all got to stay in a hotel and enjoy the city. 

“I should’ve said no when you asked for conjoined rooms.” You mumble as Harry flops onto your bed. “I thought the door would be bolted shut and you wouldn’t be able to actually get in whenever. I feel dumb.” 

Harry lays a hand on your ankle, “I miss you.” He mumbles into the mattress, his hand rubbing up and down. 

“I’m right here.” You say quietly, afraid a loud voice would ruin the moment. Harry looks up at you and frowns, “What’s wrong, Harry?”

“I invited you out here so we could spend time together, but I feel like I’m always busy. The last time we actually hung out was In Pennsylvania. I feel bad, I miss you.” 

You smile gently, “It’s okay that we don’t hang out all the time. I know you’re busy. I’m just glad to be here and to get to watch you perform almost every night.” You kick him softly so he climbs up the mattress. He rests his head on your stomach and you run a hand through his hair. 

“You’re my best friend, you know that, right?” He asks quietly, one of his hands intertwining with the one you didn’t have in his hair. You nod, “i know. You’re my best friend too.” 

Hearing him call you a friend didn’t hurt nearly as much as some people make it out to be. You knew he considered you a friend, that was just a constant ache that was there. But in this moment you couldn’t bring yourself to be hurt, this moment was perfect. 

You were content to be like this forever. Even if it was just as friends. 

July 1st, 2018 - Chicago, Illinois. 

Harry Styles, I love you. I love you. I love you. 

Love, Y/N.

“Can I ask you a question?” Harry asks from your hotel room floor. It was another week until the next show so Harry and the crew had decided you would take a much needed break in Chicago to recuperate. Some people went home, others were in rooms down the hall.

“You will anyways.” You mumble. When you look up Harry is looking at you nervously and Harry rarely gets nervous. You shut your laptop and sit up straight, “What’s up?”

“Do you like me?” He asks quickly and quietly.

“What?”

“I found a letter and it had my name on the envelope so-“

“Oh my god.” You cut Harry off, you feel mortified. How had this happened?

“And I read it and Y/N, do you like me?” He looks up at you, but you look away, unable to make eye contact with him. “Where did you find it?” You ask quietly. 

You had always been careful. They all stayed in your suitcase and when you got home they were gonna go into a box under your bed. Never to be opened by anybody except you. “It was on the bus. I just, I assumed it was from a fan or something. I’m sorry. I lo-”

“I don’t know what to say.” You cut him off, you weren’t sure if you could handle a rejection. Would you have to go home early? Would Harry insist things not get awkward and you stay? Which would be worse? 

“Y/N, if you would just listen-”

“I’ve got to- I can’t.” You scramble out of you bed and Harry follows, standing up from the floor. You bolt from the room and down the hall, you knew this hotel had a bar, maybe you could hang out there for awhile. You had to figure out how to explain you writing him love letters.

You were only gone for a couple hours, but when you got back to your room Harry was gone and there was an envelope on your bed. You recognized Harry’s handwriting immediately. 

Y/N, 

I love you. I’ve loved you from the moment I laid eyes on you. I love everything about you. Your kind heart. Your beautiful eyes. How caring and gentle you are. I couldn’t live without you. I don’t want to. I love you. I love you. I love you. I’m pretty sure I will always love you.

Yours, Harry. 

Your hands are shaking as you finish the letter, and before you can even think you’re out of the room and knocking on Harry’s door. “Please be here. Please. Please. Please.” 

He opens it, “Y/N-”

“I love you. I’ve loved since we met at that party and you asked me where I got my nail polish. I love you.” You rush out, “Still love me too?”

He leans down, “Can I kiss you?” You nod and he places a hand on your cheek before pressing his lips against yours. You wrap your arms around his neck and  he begins to pull you into his room. 

You kick the door shut and his letter falls from your hand, landing on the floor. He wraps both arms around your waist as he pulls you towards his bed. You two finally break apart when he falls back on the mattress. 

You take a deep breath as he trails kisses down your neck, “So…” he mumbles against your shoulder. 

“So… what?” You whisper as he leans back to look at you. “When do I get to read the rest of my letters?” He smirks and you push him back so he falls back.

“You’re not funny.”

I’m so sad I lost the original version of this… I’m still proud of it, but this isn’t the same :( anyways, I hope you enjoyed!!

New York is beautiful. Loud and busy, but beautiful. And it was one the shows that had time in between the next, so you all got to stay in a hotel and enjoy the city. 

“I should’ve said no when you asked for conjoined rooms.” You mumble as Harry flops onto your bed. “I thought the door would be bolted shut and you wouldn’t be able to actually get in whenever. I feel dumb.” 

Harry lays a hand on your ankle, “I miss you.” He mumbles into the mattress, his hand rubbing up and down. 

“I’m right here.” You say quietly, afraid a loud voice would ruin the moment. Harry looks up at you and frowns, “What’s wrong, Harry?”

“I invited you out here so we could spend time together, but I feel like I’m always busy. The last time we actually hung out was In Pennsylvania. I feel bad, I miss you.” 

You smile gently, “It’s okay that we don’t hang out all the time. I know you’re busy. I’m just glad to be here and to get to watch you perform almost every night.” You kick him softly so he climbs up the mattress. He rests his head on your stomach and you run a hand through his hair. 

“You’re my best friend, you know that, right?” He asks quietly, one of his hands intertwining with the one you didn’t have in his hair. You nod, “i know. You’re my best friend too.” 

Hearing him call you a friend didn’t hurt nearly as much as some people make it out to be. You knew he considered you a friend, that was just a constant ache that was there. But in this moment you couldn’t bring yourself to be hurt, this moment was perfect. 

You were content to be like this forever. Even if it was just as friends. 

July 1st, 2018 - Chicago, Illinois. 

Harry Styles, I love you. I love you. I love you. 

Love, Y/N.

“Can I ask you a question?” Harry asks from your hotel room floor. It was another week until the next show so Harry and the crew had decided you would take a much needed break in Chicago to recuperate. Some people went home, others were in rooms down the hall.

“You will anyways.” You mumble. When you look up Harry is looking at you nervously and Harry rarely gets nervous. You shut your laptop and sit up straight, “What’s up?”

“Do you like me?” He asks quickly and quietly.

“What?”

“I found a letter and it had my name on the envelope so-“

“Oh my god.” You cut Harry off, you feel mortified. How had this happened?

“And I read it and Y/N, do you like me?” He looks up at you, but you look away, unable to make eye contact with him. “Where did you find it?” You ask quietly. 

You had always been careful. They all stayed in your suitcase and when you got home they were gonna go into a box under your bed. Never to be opened by anybody except you. “It was on the bus. I just, I assumed it was from a fan or something. I’m sorry. I lo-”

“I don’t know what to say.” You cut him off, you weren’t sure if you could handle a rejection. Would you have to go home early? Would Harry insist things not get awkward and you stay? Which would be worse? 

“Y/N, if you would just listen-”

“I’ve got to- I can’t.” You scramble out of you bed and Harry follows, standing up from the floor. You bolt from the room and down the hall, you knew this hotel had a bar, maybe you could hang out there for awhile. You had to figure out how to explain you writing him love letters.

You were only gone for a couple hours, but when you got back to your room Harry was gone and there was an envelope on your bed. You recognized Harry’s handwriting immediately. 

Y/N, 

I love you. I’ve loved you from the moment I laid eyes on you. I love everything about you. Your kind heart. Your beautiful eyes. How caring and gentle you are. I couldn’t live without you. I don’t want to. I love you. I love you. I love you. I’m pretty sure I will always love you.

Yours, Harry. 

Your hands are shaking as you finish the letter, and before you can even think you’re out of the room and knocking on Harry’s door. “Please be here. Please. Please. Please.” 

He opens it, “Y/N-”

“I love you. I’ve loved since we met at that party and you asked me where I got my nail polish. I love you.” You rush out, “Still love me too?”

He leans down, “Can I kiss you?” You nod and he places a hand on your cheek before pressing his lips against yours. You wrap your arms around his neck and  he begins to pull you into his room. 

You kick the door shut and his letter falls from your hand, landing on the floor. He wraps both arms around your waist as he pulls you towards his bed. You two finally break apart when he falls back on the mattress. 

You take a deep breath as he trails kisses down your neck, “So…” he mumbles against your shoulder. 

“So… what?” You whisper as he leans back to look at you. “When do I get to read the rest of my letters?” He smirks and you push him back so he falls back.

“You’re not funny.”

I’m so sad I lost the original version of this… I’m still proud of it, but this isn’t the same :( anyways, I hope you enjoyed!!

trail.content_raw:
Summary: Inspired by To All The Boys I’ve Loved Before, you write love letters to a boy. friends to lovers. 

Warnings: maybe a curse. nothing serious, just fluff.

Requested: No. 

June 7th, 2018 - Houston, Texas

Harry Styles, You are a star. You were born to perform. You belong on stage. I feel so privileged to be able to watch you. And I get to experience this for the rest of my summer.  The energy and love you put into each show is inspiring. You care so much. I’m in awe of you every night. 

Love, Y/N

“What are you doing?” Harry leans over your shoulder as you stuff the folded up paper into an envelop. You push him away, “Ouch.”

“I’m writing my mom,” You stuff the envelope into your bag, “Telling her how much I hate it here.” Harry laughs as he looks over the snacks table. It was mostly empty, the rest of band taking what they wanted while he was in shower. 

Harry picks up an apple, “Did you mention how horrible my singing is?” 

You nod, standing up from your seat, “It was the first line. Dear Mom, Harry’s voice is awful.” You pull your bag over your shoulder and shake your head. 

He laughs as the door opens. Some venue staff comes in, “Sorry, we’re leaving now. Thank you so much for having me.” He smiles politely before dragging you from the room. 

You follow behind him, your hands intertwined. “You know I don’t actually hate it here, right?” Your rational side knows Harry is aware of the joke, but you still feel the need to reassure him you loved it here. “i love it here, I love being with you.” 

Harry turns around and squeezes your hand reassuringly, “I know.” 

June 11th, 2018 - Atlanta, Georgia. 

Harry Styles, You are beautiful. And I don’t mean in the physical sense. (Even though are beautiful in that sense too) I mean you have one of the kindest hearts ever. You care about everyone you meet, no matter their circumstances. You believe in the good and want to change the world. I’m amazed by you every day. Some stars only believe in kindness if it benefits them, if it’s good publicity. But that’s never mattered to you, I know it’s never mattered to you. You genuinely just want the best for people. I love that about you. 

Love, Y/N. 

“What are you doing?” You jump at Sarah’s voice, you turn and she’s staring at you inquisitively. 

“Nothing.” You shove the letter into your suitcase before standing up to look at her. “Just putting something away.”

She nods, unconvinced, “You know usually envelopes go in mailboxes, so they can be mailed.” You laugh nervously and walk towards the lounge area on the bus. “What is it? You can tell me, I’m good with secrets.” 

You look around, to make sure there was no one but Sarah around, before sighing. “I write love letters.” You look down at your feet, a little embarrassed, “To Harry. I write letters to him.” 

Sarah stares, “Like, how they communicated in the nineteenth century?” You nod and she bursts out laughing. Heat rushes to your face, “Stop! It’s not funny.” 

She straightens her face out and nods, “You’re right. It’s not, it’s very sweet. Harry will love that, he’s an old soul.” 

“He’s never getting them” You shake your head, “They’re more like a diary, nobody is ever supposed to read them. Just a way to express my feelings. Beside, he doesn’t feel that way, it would be weird.” 

She rolls her eyes, “That boy thinks you hung the moon and all the stars. I promise he feels the same way.” At your silence she sighs, “Don’t give him letters. But I think you should tell him, you’d be surprised with the outcome.” 

June 14th, 2018 - Hershey, Pennsylvania. 

Harry Styles, I am in the sweetest place on earth with the sweetest boy on earth. That’s very corny, but I think you would like it. You love corny jokes. I told Sarah about my letters. She thinks you would love them, but I’m not so sure. They’re not real letters, more like small entries whenever I really feel like I need to get my feelings out. It felt good to tell her though, it’s nice not having this a huge secret. I wish I could tell you, but I’m afraid that would make things awkward between is. I don’t know if I could handle things being awkward between us. It might just kill me…

Love, Y/N. 

“I love the smell of chocolate, don’t you?” You’re sitting in one the seats as Harry jogs in front of you. 

“You can smell it from here?” He stops in front of before spinning around like it would help him, “I can’t.” 

You laugh, “No, you dork. I just know some parts of the park smells like chocolate. And the store outside the park.” 

Harry rolls his eyes, “Last time I was here was with the boys. A few of us dressed up in the costumes. It was hilarious.” He shakes his head with a soft smile. 

“You miss them?” He comes to sit next to you, taking a sip from his water bottle. “Yeah, it’s weird touring without them. I did it for so long it became second nature, you know?” You nod and wipe a little sweat off Harry’s forehead with the his little towel. 

He smiles in thanks, “I love the band though. They’re amazing, and having you is the best.” He shrugs, looking down at his feet. “I’m grateful for being able to tour on my own and have my own career, I just miss them sometimes.” 

“Missing them doesn’t make you ungrateful. It makes you human.” You smile softly, “They were like your brothers, I would be worried if you didn’t miss them.”

“Have I ever told you how much I adore you?” He asks and you laugh, “Not nearly enough.”

“I adore you.”

June 22nd, 2018 - New York. New York.

Harry Styles, You have sold out arguably the most popular concert venue. Not one show, but two shows. I am so incredibly proud of you. You deserve all this and more. I hope you know that.

Love, Y/N.

New York is beautiful. Loud and busy, but beautiful. And it was one the shows that had time in between the next, so you all got to stay in a hotel and enjoy the city. 

“I should’ve said no when you asked for conjoined rooms.” You mumble as Harry flops onto your bed. “I thought the door would be bolted shut and you wouldn’t be able to actually get in whenever. I feel dumb.” 

Harry lays a hand on your ankle, “I miss you.” He mumbles into the mattress, his hand rubbing up and down. 

“I’m right here.” You say quietly, afraid a loud voice would ruin the moment. Harry looks up at you and frowns, “What’s wrong, Harry?”

“I invited you out here so we could spend time together, but I feel like I’m always busy. The last time we actually hung out was In Pennsylvania. I feel bad, I miss you.” 

You smile gently, “It’s okay that we don’t hang out all the time. I know you’re busy. I’m just glad to be here and to get to watch you perform almost every night.” You kick him softly so he climbs up the mattress. He rests his head on your stomach and you run a hand through his hair. 

“You’re my best friend, you know that, right?” He asks quietly, one of his hands intertwining with the one you didn’t have in his hair. You nod, “i know. You’re my best friend too.” 

Hearing him call you a friend didn’t hurt nearly as much as some people make it out to be. You knew he considered you a friend, that was just a constant ache that was there. But in this moment you couldn’t bring yourself to be hurt, this moment was perfect. 

You were content to be like this forever. Even if it was just as friends. 

July 1st, 2018 - Chicago, Illinois. 

Harry Styles, I love you. I love you. I love you. 

Love, Y/N.

“Can I ask you a question?” Harry asks from your hotel room floor. It was another week until the next show so Harry and the crew had decided you would take a much needed break in Chicago to recuperate. Some people went home, others were in rooms down the hall.

“You will anyways.” You mumble. When you look up Harry is looking at you nervously and Harry rarely gets nervous. You shut your laptop and sit up straight, “What’s up?”

“Do you like me?” He asks quickly and quietly.

“What?”

“I found a letter and it had my name on the envelope so-“

“Oh my god.” You cut Harry off, you feel mortified. How had this happened?

“And I read it and Y/N, do you like me?” He looks up at you, but you look away, unable to make eye contact with him. “Where did you find it?” You ask quietly. 

You had always been careful. They all stayed in your suitcase and when you got home they were gonna go into a box under your bed. Never to be opened by anybody except you. “It was on the bus. I just, I assumed it was from a fan or something. I’m sorry. I lo-”

“I don’t know what to say.” You cut him off, you weren’t sure if you could handle a rejection. Would you have to go home early? Would Harry insist things not get awkward and you stay? Which would be worse? 

“Y/N, if you would just listen-”

“I’ve got to- I can’t.” You scramble out of you bed and Harry follows, standing up from the floor. You bolt from the room and down the hall, you knew this hotel had a bar, maybe you could hang out there for awhile. You had to figure out how to explain you writing him love letters.

You were only gone for a couple hours, but when you got back to your room Harry was gone and there was an envelope on your bed. You recognized Harry’s handwriting immediately. 

Y/N, 

I love you. I’ve loved you from the moment I laid eyes on you. I love everything about you. Your kind heart. Your beautiful eyes. How caring and gentle you are. I couldn’t live without you. I don’t want to. I love you. I love you. I love you. I’m pretty sure I will always love you.

Yours, Harry. 

Your hands are shaking as you finish the letter, and before you can even think you’re out of the room and knocking on Harry’s door. “Please be here. Please. Please. Please.” 

He opens it, “Y/N-”

“I love you. I’ve loved since we met at that party and you asked me where I got my nail polish. I love you.” You rush out, “Still love me too?”

He leans down, “Can I kiss you?” You nod and he places a hand on your cheek before pressing his lips against yours. You wrap your arms around his neck and  he begins to pull you into his room. 

You kick the door shut and his letter falls from your hand, landing on the floor. He wraps both arms around your waist as he pulls you towards his bed. You two finally break apart when he falls back on the mattress. 

You take a deep breath as he trails kisses down your neck, “So…” he mumbles against your shoulder. 

“So… what?” You whisper as he leans back to look at you. “When do I get to read the rest of my letters?” He smirks and you push him back so he falls back.

“You’re not funny.”

I’m so sad I lost the original version of this… I’m still proud of it, but this isn’t the same :( anyways, I hope you enjoyed!!

blog.description: just reblogs and stuff - main acc is @pigeonkindofgal

body:
Add more to the list

The only people who can wear Leather On Leather, Denim On Denim or Pattern On Pattern are:

  • lgbtqia+ folk
  • Harry styles
  • Cecil Gershwin Palmer
